protein.specific_function: Also functions as a glutathione peroxidase.

pathway.name: Metabolism of xenobiotics by cytochrome P450

reference.reference_text: Jakobsson PJ, Mancini JA, Riendeau D, Ford-Hutchinson AW: Identification and characterization of a novel microsomal enzyme with glutathione-dependent transferase and peroxidase activities. J Biol Chem. 1997 Sep 5;272(36):22934-9.
